text: Burghul () is a food made from cracked par-boiled wheat. It is sometimes called bulgur. It is very popular in Middle Eastern and Turkish cuisines. == References == Category:Grains Category:Cypriot food Category:Lebanese food Category:Jordanian food Category:Syrian food Category:Palestinian food Category:Armenian food Category:Wheat Category:Turkish food Category:Persian food Category:Israeli food Category:Kurdish food
title: Bulgur
